title: Print, "Crew of the U.S. Steam-sloop "Colorado," Shipped at Boston, June 1861, from Harper's Weekly, July 13, 1861, p. 439.", July 13, 1861
medium: Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper.
signed: Signed on block, lower left: Homer.
description: Horizontal group of sailors standing on the deck of the ship, facing the spectator.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Crew of the U.S. Steam-sloop "Colorado," Shipped at Boston, June 1861, from Harper's Weekly, July 13, 1861, p. 439.", July 13, 1861.
July 13, 1861. Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper.. Gift of Arthur B. Carlson. 1951-93-6.
